attributes.action: Ban law-breakers holding elected/non-elected office (local/ devolved or national government)in the UK for life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'Law breakers' cannot be 'law makers'- easy as that. Given the current/previous examples of 'law-breaking' by elected representatives we- the electorate- say enough is enough. If anybody breaks the law, a life-time ban on holding elected/non-elected office within government is enacted. This will also include:-i) people sitting in the House of Lords who were NOT elected by the people; ii) people serving on QUANGOS- again those NOT elected by the people.
